title: Friday Roundup: Women’s Torino Nice adventure, Rearview mirror, Win Campy Ekar or a Ripmo & more!
content:
Follow women from 7 countries tackle the 700km Torino Nice Rally – Starting today, September 24, ultra-endurance cyclist Lael Wilcox is leading a group of 20+ women from 7 different countries, as they set out to bikepack the well-known Torino Nice Rally cycling route. Said to be the first European bikepacking challenge of this scope

The post Friday Roundup: Women’s Torino Nice adventure, Rearview mirror, Win Campy Ekar or a Ripmo & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
